DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine Hummingbird ear tube delivery system safe effective way put ear tubes place .
DOC.brief_title: Hummingbird TTS Ear Tube Delivery Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . Scheduled undergo tympanostomy tube insertion . 2 . At least 6 month old . 3 . Subject able willing comply followup requirement . 4 . Signed Informed Consent , Parental Consent Form , Child Assent Form applicable . 1 . Any condition opinion investigator may place subject great risk ( e.g. , pregnancy ) 2 . Significantly atrophic tympanic membrane . 3 . Significantly atelectatic tympanic membrane . For example , tympanic membrane contact promontory cochlea . 4 . Anatomy preclude sufficient visualization access tympanic membrane .
